ygData.subject: SV: Dissappointed in EverQuest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe you wanna know something? I m going to join Scarlet Horizon, but before I can join I have to do this quest, and Galihad said my quest was to get GhoulBane
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe you wanna know something? I'm going to join Scarlet Horizon, but before I can join I have to do this quest, and Galihad said my quest was to get GhoulBane hehehe(btw Elayna ROCKS!:)

I camped ghoulbane more yesterday, ended with a total of 11 hours, and the shin lord didn't spawn once, talk about bad luck, statistically he should pop once every 4 spawns(A GM agreed on this number) and he managed to beat the odds by not showing up for over 35 spawns, we should have seen the lord about 9 times hehe.. DOOOOH!!!(Homer style)

I'm gonna keep trying, don't have much choice, but I've been going to bed at 9am for about 2 weeks trying to get this bloody sword now, it's wearing me down hehe..

- Avron Akizuki - Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: <MFerrulo@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 5:35 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dissappointed in EverQuest
